law.catch_line: Annual Inspection Of Compliance With Far Averaging Covenant.
law.full_text:
ANNUAL INSPECTION OF COMPLIANCE WITH FAR AVERAGING COVENANT. (Amended by Ord. No. 173,268, Eff. 7/1/00, Oper. 7/1/00.)
A fee of $300.00 shall be charged and collected by the Department of Building and Safety to cover the cost of an annual inspection to monitor compliance with the FAR Averaging Covenant required pursuant to Sections 12.24 B.25. and 12.24 C.58. prior to July 1, 2000 and Section 12.24 W.19. on and after July 1, 2000, and for maintaining records of those covenants.

LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
ANNUAL INSPECTION OF COMPLIANCE WITH FAR AVERAGING COVENANT. (§ 19.11)
